attributes.action: Hold an enquiry into the awarding of a Knighthood to Nick Clegg
attributes.background: Nick Clegg has refused to accept the democratic process concerning Brexit vote and continued to campaign and undermine the will of the people who voted to leave the EU. He even lost his Parliamentary seat having losing the support of his constituents. This award smacks if jingoism!!!

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments.
